CustomField.formula: IF((ISBLANK(vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c) || ISNULL(vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c)) || (ISBLANK(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c) || ISNULL(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c)), 'Green', IF(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c >= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c, 'Red', CASE(vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyIntervalUnit__c, 'Seconds', IF(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c + vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c/(24*60*60) <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Calendar Hours', IF(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c + vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c/24 <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Calendar Days', IF(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c + vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), /* TODO: Gap - business intervals doesn't support business calendar */ 'Business Hours', IF(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c + vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c/24 <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Business Days', IF(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c + vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Green') ))
CustomField.label: Jeopardy Status
